mapper.select: select ifnull((select name from organization b where a.orgid=b.id),'') as orgidname, ifnull((select name from place b where a.portid=b.id),'') as portidname, ifnull((select name from organization b where a.shipcompany=b.id),'') as shipcompanyname, ifnull((select boxsize from boxs b where a.boxtype=b.id),'') as boxtypeboxsize, ifnull((select name from place b where a.takeboxplaceid=b.id),'') as takeboxplaceidname, ifnull((select name from place b where a.endplaceid=b.id),'') as endplaceidname, ifnull((select enumvaluename from enumtable b where a.billstatus=b.enumvalueid and b.enumtype='1003'),'') as billstatusenumvaluename, ifnull((select fullname from sys_user b where a.makeuser=b.id),'') as makeuserfullname, ifnull((select fullname from sys_user b where a.accuser=b.id),'') as accuserfullname, a.* from leaveportmain a where id = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from leaveportmain where id in
#{id}
